thread.title: Gucci Mane Announces "Drop Top Wizop" Album
thread.title_full: Gucci Mane Announces "Drop Top Wizop" Album

author: Trevor Smith
title: Gucci Mane Announces "Drop Top Wizop" Album
text:
Home > Music > Gucci Mane Announces "Drop Top Wizop" Album Gucci Mane Announces "Drop Top Wizop" Album 1 0 Posted by Trevor Smith  30pm Gucci's first project of 2017 is "coming soon." 
Gucci Mane was released from prison in May of 2016, but still managed to put out more projects than most rappers that year. After closing 2016 out with the holiday-themed The Return Of East Atlanta Santa , his third project since release, Gucci has announced his first album of the new year; Drop Top Wizop . My new album is going to be called — Gucci Mane (@gucci1017) January 24, 2017 
Gucci shared the title today on Twitter, indicating that the project was "coming soon," but not sharing a concrete release date. #DropTopWizop Album coming soon — Gucci Mane (@gucci1017) January 24, 2017 
Earlier today, he guested on Ralo's "They Can't Stop Us" single. Currently, Gucci has 3 songs on the Hot 100: "Both," his own track with Drake at 44, as well as his features on Rae Sremmurd's "Black Beatles" and Chirs Brown's "Party," at 3 and 45, respectively.
